mapper.select: SELECT vt.template_id, vt.name AS template_name, vtp.property_name, vtp.property_code, vtp.property_type, locate(#{keyWord}, vt.name) as name_index, locate(#{keyWord}, vtp.property_name) as property_name_index FROM ${tablePrefix}template_property_rel vtpr LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}template_property vtp ON vtpr.property_code = vtp.property_code LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}template vt on vtpr.template_id = vt.template_id WHERE vtp.is_deleted = 0 AND vtp.i18n_name = #{lang} AND (vt.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') OR (vtp.property_type = 1 AND (vtp.property_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%'))))
